nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: There he is, the famous referee, Cannoloco. They say he’s the toughest cookie in the oven. Better approach him carefully, or you might end up in deep dough.

nodes.speaker: referee
nodes.text: Mi compá, are you excited for the match? Top notch fighter, straight from the hot tray.

nodes.speaker: player
nodes.text: I’m dough-lighted to see you, and of course I'm excited for the match! Now let’s talk business, shall we?

nodes.speaker: referee
nodes.text: Alright, I'm going to be real with you because what I'm about to say can only be betweeen us.

nodes.speaker: referee
nodes.text: You think you butter me up? I’ve blown whistles for bigger dough boys than you.

nodes.speaker: referee
nodes.text: Bias? I call it fair! Unless someone pays better, of course. Hypothetically speaking.

nodes.speaker: referee
nodes.text: Well… maybe I didn’t see that foul. Maybe I was busy polishing my whistle.

nodes.speaker: referee
nodes.text: You trying to butter me up? You’ll get burned for that.
